targets.query:
from(bucket: "${server}")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> first()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "${server}")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value * 10
  }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["player", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: -10y, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deaths")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["player"] == "${player}")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "warnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "clients")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "l2avgticktime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "l2stickspersec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "generatingChunks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "entities" or r["_measurement"] == "entitiesActive")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "chunks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "packetspresec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kilobytespersec")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "errors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "warnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "overloadwarnings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "deaths")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "clients")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value * 10
  }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["player", "_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "online")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < $ping)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logticks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] < $maxLogtickMs)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logticks")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "$server")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logticks")
  |> yield()

panels.title: Logticks sorted by means average over-time

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "${server}",
  tag: "player",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -1y
)
list.name: player
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "${server}",
  tag: "player",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -1y
)
